bannerSection.title: Your opportunity to make a difference. Today!
bannerSection.description: Your neighbours, parents and friends are depending on each other like never before. Many people cannot or do not want to leave their place during Corona. We have created a matching service where you can find and offer help in this unique situation for humanity.
bannerSection.disclaimerText: This service is free of charge!

helpingSection.title1: Help someone in need near you
helpingSection.description1: Whether it is doing groceries shopping or walking the dog â€“ there is something you can do!
helpingSection.title2: Let others know what you need
helpingSection.description2: Can't leave your house? Quarantine? Let someone help you out!

faqs.title: How does the matching work?
faqs.description: Your inquiry for help is shown anonymously to people in your area. Anyone can send you an offer and you can choose the helper. Only then, your information is transmitted.

faqs.title: Is it free to accept help?
faqs.description: Yes. The goal of this platform is to help each other out. It should also be avoided to exchange cash due to the risk of infection.

faqs.title: Who can see my address or phone number?
faqs.description: Your personal data is not publicly visible and you decide who can see it. As soon as there is a "match", both your phone numbers are visible to the other person so that you can coordinate.

faqs.title: Is it safe to accept help from strangers?
faqs.description: As a person in need, you can speak to the helper upfront via phone. If you have a bad feeling about it, you can still cancel the offer! In that case, please let us know about it.

faqs.title: Does this work in my country/city?
faqs.description: Yes, thanks to you and many others! This site relies on the phenomenon of so-called network effects where every user gets more value if more users sign up. Every person counts!

lastFaq.title: How can we support the platform Helping hands?
lastFaq.description: In many ways! We need translators, community helpers who respond to questions and emails, web developers and of course people who make others aware of this service.
lastFaq.link: Let us know and we invite you to our Slack workspace to discuss with us and like-minded people.
